changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ruleform.entity_location_network ( id bigserial NOT NULL, -- Otherwise meaningless identifier for a rule entity bigint NOT NULL, -- The specific Entity being located. contextual_entity bigint NOT NULL, -- The Entity that is being used as a frame of reference; the one from the 'entity' column is located relative to this Entity in some way. coordinate bigint NOT NULL, -- The address of 'entity' relative to 'contextual_entity'. notes character varying, -- Usage notes for this rule research bigint, -- A research flag that has been set on an individual rule updated_by bigint NOT NULL, -- The Resource that last updated this rule update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, -- The time at which this rule was last updated resource bigint NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT entity_location_network_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT entity_location_network_contextual_entity_fkey FOREIGN KEY (contextual_entity) REFERENCES ruleform.entity (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT entity_location_network_coordinate_fkey FOREIGN KEY (coordinate) REFERENCES ruleform.coordinate (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT entity_location_network_entity_fkey FOREIGN KEY (entity) REFERENCES ruleform.entity (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT entity_location_network_research_fkey FOREIGN KEY (research) REFERENCES ruleform.research (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT entity_location_network_resource_fkey FOREIGN KEY (resource) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT entity_location_network_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT entity_location_network_entity_key UNIQUE (resource , entity , contextual_entity , coordinate ) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE ); COMMENT ON TABLE ruleform.entity_location_network IS 'Specifies locational relationships that exist between Entities'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.entity_location_network.id IS 'Otherwise meaningless identifier for a rule'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.entity_location_network.entity IS 'The specific Entity being located.'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.entity_location_network.contextual_entity IS 'The Entity that is being used as a frame of reference; the one from the ''entity'' column is located relative to this Entity in some way.'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.entity_location_network.coordinate IS 'The address of ''entity'' relative to ''contextual_entity''.'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.entity_location_network.notes IS 'Usage notes for this rule'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.entity_location_network.research IS 'A research flag that has been set on an individual rule'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.entity_location_network.updated_by IS 'The Resource that last updated this rule'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.entity_location_network.update_date IS 'The time at which this rule was last updated';
